languages.text: "Посторонись, святотатец! Священная машина исправно служит тебе, а ты смеешь порочить ее?!"

traits.locale_text: "Посторонись, святотатец!" {n}Техножрец внимательно изучает показатели приборов, нависнув на когитатором.{/n} "Священная машина исправно служит тебе, а ты смеешь порочить ее?!"

languages.text: "Step back, defiler! The hallowed machine serves you impeccably, yet you besmirch its sanctity?"
languages.original_text: "Посторонись, святотатец! Священная машина исправно служит тебе, а ты смеешь порочить ее?!"

traits.locale_text: "Step away, profaner... The hallowed machine serves you without fault, yet you besmirch its operation?"
"Step away, profaner... The hallowed machine serves you without fault, yet you besmirch its operation?"
"Step back, defiler! The hallowed machine serves you impeccably, yet you besmirch its sanctity?"
"Step back, defiler! The hallowed machine serves you impeccably, yet you besmirch its sanctity?"
"Step back, defiler! The hallowed machine serves you impeccably, yet you besmirch its sanctity?"
"Step back, defiler! The hallowed machine serves you impeccably, yet you besmirch its sanctity?"

languages.text: « Arrière, hérétique ! Cette machine sacrée vous sert à merveille et vous osez en souiller la sainteté ? »
languages.original_text: "Step back, defiler! The hallowed machine serves you impeccably, yet you besmirch its sanctity?"

traits.locale_text: « Arrière, hérétique ! Cette machine sacrée vous sert à merveille et vous osez en souiller la sainteté ? »

languages.text: “走开，亵渎之人！这台神圣的机器为你提供了无可挑剔的服务，可你竟敢玷污它的圣洁？”
languages.original_text: "Step back, defiler! The hallowed machine serves you impeccably, yet you besmirch its sanctity?"

traits.locale_text: “走开，亵渎之人！这台神圣的机器为你提供了无可挑剔的服务，可你竟敢玷污它的圣洁？”

languages.text: "Zurück, Schänder! Die heilige Maschine dient Euch makellos und Ihr besudelt ihre Heiligkeit?"
languages.original_text: "Step back, defiler! The hallowed machine serves you impeccably, yet you besmirch its sanctity?"

traits.locale_text: "Zurück, Schänder! Die heilige Maschine dient Euch makellos und Ihr besudelt ihre Heiligkeit?"

languages.text: «¡Atrás, profanador! Esta máquina sagrada realiza un servicio impecable, ¿y aun así deshonras su santidad?».
languages.original_text: "Step back, defiler! The hallowed machine serves you impeccably, yet you besmirch its sanctity?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Atrás, profanador! Esta máquina sagrada realiza un servicio impecable, ¿y aun así deshonras su santidad?».

languages.text: 「下がれ、ディファイラー！神聖な機械が完璧に仕えているというのに、お前は、そのサンクティティを汚すのか？」
languages.original_text: "Step back, defiler! The hallowed machine serves you impeccably, yet you besmirch its sanctity?"

traits.locale_text: 「下がれ、ディファイラー！神聖な機械が完璧に仕えているというのに、お前は、そのサンクティティを汚すのか？」

languages.text: "Geri dur pislik! Kutsal makine sana kusursuzca hizmet ediyor, sense onun mukaddesliğine dil mi uzatıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Step back, defiler! The hallowed machine serves you impeccably, yet you besmirch its sanctity?"

traits.locale_text: "Geri dur pislik! Kutsal makine sana kusursuzca hizmet ediyor ve sen de onun mukaddesliğine dil mi uzatıyorsun?"
